sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The European Union has struck an historic deal to regulate artificial intelligence after a mammoth 33 hours of talks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Negotiators from the European Parliament and the bloc's 27 member countries overcame big differences on controversial points, including generative AI and police use of face recognition surveillance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: We had one objective, to deliver a legislation that would ensure that the ecosystem of AI in Europe would develop with a human-centric approach respecting fundamental rights and the European values, building trust, building consciousness of how we can get the best out of this AI revolution that is happening before our eyes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Generative AI systems have dazzled users with the ability to produce human-like text, photos and songs, but have raised fears about the risks to jobs and privacy.
